item.title: TASTE VENGENCE! not
item.dc:creator: @valiken valiken
item.description:
@valiken wrote:

Why can’t I use vengence? It says I have to be a member to use it… So how do I make it a non-member’s emote, too?

} inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(1979); txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } } if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("You have to be a member to use vengeance!"); break;

Read full topic
